channel.title: ChatBox , Interfaces like Runescape -Java-
channel.description: how can i make a little chat box umm maybe like runescape when i click button or do something the chat box will say something . i mean like the runescape chatbox when player EXAM something its says on the check Box "This is a dragon".. and how to make an interface like runescape ( i mean like bank interface, quest interface or something like this ) Thank you.
